headline: AP News Summary at 10:56 p.m. EDT
author: AP

McCarthy's push to ascend to House speaker relies on Trump

In election misinformation fight, '2020 changed everything'
WASHINGTON (AP) — As voters get ready for hundreds of elections of local and national importance this year, officials and voting rights advocates are bracing for a repeat of the misinformation that overwhelmed the 2020 presidential election.

Tigers' Cabrera gets 3,000th hit; 33rd player to reach mark
DETROIT (AP) — Detroit Tigers star Miguel Cabrera has gotten the 3,000th hit of his decorated career, becoming the 33rd major leaguer to reach the mark and the first player from Venezuela to accomplish the feat.
